<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &lt; PadTo - 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;p++ = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#39;\\x80&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;p++ = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&#39;\\x00&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)(p - orig&#95;p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Utility function to decode a ULEB128 value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If \\p error is non-null, it will point to a static error message,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if an error occured. It will not be modified on success.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3720bbfe79232f7792ab4b969dfbeed0"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3720bbfe79232f7792ab4b969dfbeed0">decodeULEB128</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;p, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;n = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;end = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;orig&#95;p = p;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Shift = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(p == end)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;malformed uleb128, extends past end&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Slice = &#42;p &amp; 0x7f;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(Shift &gt;= 63) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        ((Shift == 63 &amp;&amp; (Slice &lt;&lt; Shift &gt;&gt; Shift) != Slice) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">         (Shift &gt; 63 &amp;&amp; Slice != 0))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;uleb128 too big for uint64&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> += Slice &lt;&lt; Shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    Shift += 7;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;p++ &gt;= 128);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Utility function to decode a SLEB128 value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If \\p error is non-null, it will point to a static error message,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if an error occured. It will not be modified on success.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a405b6cecd013148b4b443dd37854b4c4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a405b6cecd013148b4b443dd37854b4c4">decodeSLEB128</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;p, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;n = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;end = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;orig&#95;p = p;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Shift = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t Byte;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(p == end)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;malformed sleb128, extends past end&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    Byte = &#42;p;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Slice = Byte &amp; 0x7f;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(Shift &gt;= 63) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">        ((Shift == 63 &amp;&amp; Slice != 0 &amp;&amp; Slice != 0x7f) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">         (Shift &gt; 63 &amp;&amp; Slice != (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt; 0 ? 127 : 0x00)))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;sleb128 too big for int64&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= Slice &lt;&lt; Shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    Shift += 7;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++p;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Byte &gt;= 128);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sign extend negative numbers if needed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Shift &lt; 64 &amp;&amp; (Byte &amp; 0x40))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> &lt;&lt; Shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (n)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
